name: rngorcan
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c3, c5, c4)), wceq(c1, c3)))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, crngo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c5, c4), co(c3, c5, c4)), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(c5, cgr))

comment: Right cancellation law for the addition operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
